page.title: 07Factories,Pin Green,Stev.
page.content: In our area there were 31 { factories,}we surveyed 16.Most of them work 9 hours a day,Monday to Friday with half day Saturday.There are three different sorts of factories.There were 8 factories that serviced things ,4 that{made things} and 4{commercial.}Between five and thirty people work in each factory.At lunchtime there are quite a few who bring sandwiches but most of them go to the pub.Two or three factories only have half an hour lunch break but most have an hour. All the factories have logos which are signs a factory has to mark its company.{Pot Pourri's}logo is" P.P". Pot Pourri sounds like a herb and spices factory but it really makes Comedy Videos.It is also strange because there are 5O people working there.
